attributes.action: Ensure that all key public sector workers receive at least 3% pay rise in 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Today, 2/3/07, Gordon Brown announced that many public sector workers would receive less than the rate of inflation as a pay deal for 2007 - in reality forcing a pay cut, and a drop in the standard of living as inflation, and especially energy costs, outstrip the money such a pay deal would bring in.
